items.title: Implement AI Recommendation Engine
items.description: Develop and integrate an AI-based recommendation system to suggest relevant products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System generates at least 5 relevant product recommendations for each user session
Recommendations update dynamically based on user interactions within the same session
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing
non_functional: System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent users

notes: No actionable feedback was provided ('kjkljlkjsd kl'), so the requirement remains unchanged from the previous version.
